member.name: STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_ACTIVATE
member.summary: This structure contains information about the downloaded firmware to activate.

member.name: STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_ACTIVATE.Version
member.summary: The version of this structure. This should be set to sizeof(STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_ACTIVATE).

member.name: STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_ACTIVATE.Size
member.summary: The size of this structure. This should be set to sizeof(STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_ACTIVATE).

summary.para: The flags associated with the activation request. The following are valid flags that can be set in this member.

listheader.description: Indicates that the target of the request is a controller or adapter, different than the device handle or object itself (e.g. NVMe SSD or HBA).
Indicates that the existing firmware image in the specified slot should be activated.

member.name: STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_ACTIVATE.Slot
member.summary: The slot with the firmware image that is to be activated.
